text: Scott Kellerman Foley (born July 15, 1972) is an American actor, director, and screenwriter. Foley is known for roles in television shows such as The Unit, Felicity, and Scandal, and in movies such as Scream 3. He has also guest starred in series including Dawson's Creek, Scrubs, Grey's Anatomy, and House. == Other websites == * Category:1972 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Kansas Category:Kansas City, Kansas Category:Living people
title: Scott Foley
